text: The opening to each stand inside the crown at the top was one cubit deep,7:31 One cubit is approximately 18 inches or 45.7 centimeters. with a round opening like the design of a pedestal, a cubit and a half wide.7:31 A cubit and a half is approximately 2.25 feet or 68.6 centimeters wide; similarly in verse 32. And around its opening were engravings, but the panels of the stands were square, not round.
